messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([A-Za-z]+,\s*)*[A-Za-z]+'

Imagine a group of seven scholars: Vicky, Amir, Wim, Raj, Jing, Wei and Nisha. You are friends with Vicky, who can either introduce you to Amir or Wim.  Amir is connected with Raj, and Raj is connected with Wei. Wei is donating 10 books, but you do not take any books, you're just learning about the environment. Then you exit and start over. This time you ask Vicky to introduce you to Wim, who is connected with Jing, and Jing is connected with Nisha. Nisha is donating 50 books, but you do not take any books, you're just learning about the environment. You will only be able to choose one path from Vicky that leads to the maximum number of books. Which scholar can Vicky connect you with, who will lead to the path with maximum number of books?

Based on your requests, you do not select or collect or acquire books when choosing scholars' connection paths at each pass of interactions and are simply learning while navigating a network of a social activity group; with given constraints; you and the other connected scholars are connected to both (Wim, Jing and Amir; in a different round, respectively) and learn and exit; thus you will choose who from the group of scholars at first instance based with a chance in favor of those directly to Vicky for higher potential or chance to discover pathways yielding more and broader information, but first you may choose the following person Vicky connect, Wim then JIng to whom directly you wish to ask or interact for Wims first scholar connected, and to learn from this process before you final path selection or final connection as you decide to either branch with Nisha( who will lead into total possible acquisition connections including multiple passes of learning opportunities to acquire knowledge from these activities as you decide and explore at will; and with 12 potential books connected) while Jing will have one potential option connecting five of the scholars while leading you down more narrow learning and engagement paths which will limit books obtained in comparison. Which scholar Vicky shall you follow his connecting pathways by choosing who between connections for an optimizable flow of highest information from each node followed. Your chosen answer, is in [A-Za-z]+ format to capture information sources followed. (Answer, [A-Za-z\s]+ \*[A-Za-z  \] or [WjNV]]
You want to know with which other expert scholars or scholar network communities can assist knowledge growth while giving you potential or leading to wider a knowledge landscape among them. This will depend on how much you engage and share common topics for exchange to create potential learning opportunities
Hints are available if the answer needs to be expanded further or for clarification to get full details with a step by step, just comment and ask questions. Happy thinking time!
From scholar Amir what is the shortest path to scholar Wei? Starting from scholar Amir, please list the scholar names in order, including Amir, separated by commas.

Of course user! I shall provide the step by step reasoning process by breaking up this problem, into work with the available information into manageable pieces we have here in front! 
Step A: Vicky could lead to Amir connecting us to this particular flow where Nisha as the biggest resource potential lies. That could connect through potential paths 5 if connecting JIng as the short path towards a resource acuqisition to Wim then back or a jump cut NIsha so Amir takes short lead; either way, we gain short to the point, optimizations and highest value for least effort towards achieving resource optimization, if JIng was not the connective and with a leeway of the next potential step! and connects a step more towards a resource in exchange to grow one's common or mutaual understanding in the exchange among social networks such to learn and share experiences or knowledge in that particular subject at large.
However this path requires Amir, as starting connection so lets firstly take or step from the first direct leWjV as VicTo begin this quest where with first  Wimgin lead connectivity we learn for optimally and efficiently for maximum acquisition potential for a narrowed resource connection and learn or exchange path in exchange for higher chance and highest mutual knowledge or value grip from  potentials before branch
